name: Fetch Quest (void Games(play);)
description:
I haven't used Unity in a while, but now I've made another game in it!

I've found Godot is better than Unity for 2D games, while Unity is nicer for 3D games.

I made the models in Blender, the music by connecting a MIDI key board to a computer with garage band, and the sound effect (yes, there is only one sound effect) in Bosca Ceoli.

Hope you enjoy! :)
